title: [Ta'Vaalor Historical Society]
description: The ebonwood and mahogany parquet floor forms an unbroken pattern from one side of this grand entryway to the other.  A pair of tall, narrow windows frame the iron-hinged front door, spilling sunlight into the nearly empty room.  Set at a slight angle just by the entrance is a sparsely ornamented writing desk.

The ebonwood and mahogany parquet floor forms an unbroken pattern from one side of this grand entryway to the other.  A pair of tall, narrow windows frame the iron-hinged front door, spilling moonlight into the nearly empty room.  Set at a slight angle just by the entrance is a sparsely ornamented writing desk.
